lexUnit.name: hilarious.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: causing much laughter or amusement

sentence.text: He added , ` Michael Crawford , gangling , gauche and trying to escape from life through Oriental mysticism , achieves some really hilarious effects with his alternating bouts of unworldly chatter and inexplicable rage . "
